00603 inline bool CStdImage::IsEmpty() const
00604 {
00605         return (m_Image.pPixelStream==NULL);
00606 }
00607 
00608 inline float CStdImage::GetPixelInterpolated(float x, float y) const
00609 {
00610         // for graytone images only
00611         // for 1 and 8 b/p: uses bilinar interpolation
00612         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00613         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00614 
00615         if ((m_Image.Bits!=1) && (m_Image.Bits!=4) && (m_Image.Bits!=8))
00616         {
00617                 ostringstream ost;
00618                 ost << "CStdImage::GetPixelInterpolated() Image must be 1,8 or 24 b/p" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00619                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00620                 return 0;
00621         }
00622 
00623         if((x>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+m_Image.BorderSize-1) &&
00624                 (y>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+m_Image.BorderSize-1))
00625         {
00626                 // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00627                 int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00628                 int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00629                 // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00630                 int xh = xl + 1;
00631                 int yh = yl + 1;
00632                 // do bilinear interpolation
00633                 return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(float)xl))*((float)yh-y) +
00634                  (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(float)xl))*(y-(float)yl));
00635         }
00636         else
00637         {
00638                 ostringstream ost;
00639                 ost << "CStdImage::GetPixelInterpolated(" << x << "," << y << 
00640                         ") Needs to access pixels outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00641                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00642                 return -1;
00643         }
00644 }
00645 
00646 inline float CStdImage::GetPixelInterpolated(const CPoint2D<float>& Pos) const
00647 {
00648         // for graytone images only
00649         // for 1 and 8 b/p: uses bilinar interpolation
00650         float x=Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00651         float y=Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00652 
00653         if ((m_Image.Bits!=1) && (m_Image.Bits!=4) && (m_Image.Bits!=8))
00654         {
00655                 ostringstream ost;
00656                 ost << "CStdImage::GetPixelInterpolated() Image must be 1,8 or 24 b/p" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00657                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00658                 return 0;
00659         }
00660 
00661         if((x>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+m_Image.BorderSize-1) &&
00662                 (y>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+m_Image.BorderSize-1))
00663         {
00664                 // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00665                 int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00666                 int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00667                 // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00668                 int xh = xl + 1;
00669                 int yh = yl + 1;
00670                 // do bilinear interpolation
00671                 return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(float)xl))*((float)yh-y) +
00672                  (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(float)xl))*(y-(float)yl));
00673         }
00674         else
00675         {
00676                 ostringstream ost;
00677                 ost << "CStdImage::GetPixelInterpolated" << Pos << 
00678                         " Needs to access pixels outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00679                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00680                 return -1;
00681         }
00682 }

00684 inline float CStdImage::GetPixelInterpolatedFast(float x, float y) const
00685 {
00686         // for graytone images only
00687         // for 1 and 8 b/p: uses bilinar interpolation
00688         // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00689         int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00690         int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00691         // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00692         int xh = xl + 1;
00693         int yh = yl + 1;
00694         // do bilinear interpolation
00695         return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(float)xl))*((float)yh-y) +
00696          (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(float)xl))*(y-(float)yl));
00697 }

00699 inline float CStdImage::GetPixelInterpolatedFast(const CPoint2D<float>& Pos) const
00700 {
00701         // for graytone images only
00702         // for 1 and 8 b/p: uses bilinar interpolation
00703         // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00704         float x=Pos.GetX();
00705         float y=Pos.GetY();
00706         int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00707         int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00708         // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00709         int xh = xl + 1;
00710         int yh = yl + 1;
00711         // do bilinear interpolation
00712         return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(float)xl))*((float)yh-y) +
00713          (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((float)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(float)xl))*(y-(float)yl));
00714 }
00715 
00716 inline UINT32 CStdImage::GetColorInterpolated(float x, float y) const
00717 {
00718         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00719         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00720 
00721         if (m_Image.Bits!=24)
00722         {
00723                 ostringstream ost;
00724                 ost << "CStdImage::GetColorInterpolated() Image must be 24 b/p" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00725                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00726                 return 0;
00727         }
00728 
00729         if((x>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+m_Image.BorderSize-1) &&
00730                 (y>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+m_Image.BorderSize-1))
00731         {
00732                 // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00733                 int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00734                 int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00735                 // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00736                 int xh = xl + 1;
00737                 int yh = yl + 1;
00738                 // do bilinear interpolation
00739                 UINT32 UL=GetPixelFast(xl,yl); // Upper left pixel
00740                 UINT32 UR=GetPixelFast(xh,yl); // Upper right pixel
00741                 UINT32 LL=GetPixelFast(xl,yh); // Lower left pixel
00742                 UINT32 LR=GetPixelFast(xh,yh); // Lower right pixel
00743                 // Adding 0.5 before converting to UINT32 rounds the result to the right value!
00744                 UINT32 RVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetRVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetRVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00745                                                 (k_PalGetRVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetRVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00746                 UINT32 GVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetGVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetGVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00747                                                 (k_PalGetGVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetGVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00748                 UINT32 BVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetBVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetBVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00749                                                 (k_PalGetBVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetBVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00750                 return k_PalCreateRGB(RVal,GVal,BVal);
00751         }
00752         else
00753         {
00754                 ostringstream ost;
00755                 ost << "CStdImage::GetColorInterpolated(" << x << "," << y << 
00756                         ") Needs to access pixels outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00757                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00758                 return 0;
00759         }
00760 }
00761 
00762 inline UINT32 CStdImage::GetColorInterpolated(const CPoint2D<float>& Pos) const
00763 {
00764         float x=Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00765         float y=Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00766 
00767         if (m_Image.Bits!=24)
00768         {
00769                 ostringstream ost;
00770                 ost << "CStdImage::GetColorInterpolated() Image must be 24 b/p" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00771                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00772                 return 0;
00773         }
00774 
00775         if((x>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+m_Image.BorderSize-1) &&
00776                 (y>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+m_Image.BorderSize-1))
00777         {
00778                 // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00779                 int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00780                 int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00781                 // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00782                 int xh = xl + 1;
00783                 int yh = yl + 1;
00784                 // do bilinear interpolation
00785                 UINT32 UL=GetPixelFast(xl,yl); // Upper left pixel
00786                 UINT32 UR=GetPixelFast(xh,yl); // Upper right pixel
00787                 UINT32 LL=GetPixelFast(xl,yh); // Lower left pixel
00788                 UINT32 LR=GetPixelFast(xh,yh); // Lower right pixel
00789                 // Adding 0.5 before converting to UINT32 rounds the result to the right value!
00790                 UINT32 RVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetRVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetRVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00791                                                 (k_PalGetRVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetRVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00792                 UINT32 GVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetGVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetGVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00793                                                 (k_PalGetGVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetGVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00794                 UINT32 BVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetBVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetBVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00795                                                 (k_PalGetBVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetBVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00796                 return k_PalCreateRGB(RVal,GVal,BVal);
00797         }
00798         else
00799         {
00800                 ostringstream ost;
00801                 ost << "CStdImage::GetColorInterpolated" << Pos << 
00802                         " Needs to access pixels outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00803                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00804                 return 0;
00805         }
00806 }
00807 
00808 inline UINT32 CStdImage::GetColorInterpolatedFast(float x, float y) const
00809 {
00810         // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00811         int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00812         int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00813         // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00814         int xh = xl + 1;
00815         int yh = yl + 1;
00816         // do bilinear interpolation
00817         UINT32 UL=GetPixelFast(xl,yl); // Upper left pixel
00818         UINT32 UR=GetPixelFast(xh,yl); // Upper right pixel
00819         UINT32 LL=GetPixelFast(xl,yh); // Lower left pixel
00820         UINT32 LR=GetPixelFast(xh,yh); // Lower right pixel
00821         // Adding 0.5 before converting to UINT32 rounds the result to the right value!
00822         UINT32 RVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetRVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetRVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00823                                         (k_PalGetRVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetRVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00824         UINT32 GVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetGVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetGVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00825                                         (k_PalGetGVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetGVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00826         UINT32 BVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetBVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetBVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00827                                         (k_PalGetBVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetBVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00828         return k_PalCreateRGB(RVal,GVal,BVal);
00829 }

00831 inline UINT32 CStdImage::GetColorInterpolatedFast(const CPoint2D<float>& Pos) const
00832 {
00833         float x=Pos.GetX();
00834         float y=Pos.GetY();
00835         // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00836         int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00837         int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00838         // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00839         int xh = xl + 1;
00840         int yh = yl + 1;
00841         // do bilinear interpolation
00842         UINT32 UL=GetPixelFast(xl,yl); // Upper left pixel
00843         UINT32 UR=GetPixelFast(xh,yl); // Upper right pixel
00844         UINT32 LL=GetPixelFast(xl,yh); // Lower left pixel
00845         UINT32 LR=GetPixelFast(xh,yh); // Lower right pixel
00846         // Adding 0.5 before converting to UINT32 rounds the result to the right value!
00847         UINT32 RVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetRVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetRVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00848                                         (k_PalGetRVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetRVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00849         UINT32 GVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetGVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetGVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00850                                         (k_PalGetGVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetGVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00851         UINT32 BVal=(UINT32)((k_PalGetBVal(UL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetBVal(UR)*(x-xl))*(yh-y) +
00852                                         (k_PalGetBVal(LL)*(xh-x) + k_PalGetBVal(LR)*(x-xl))*(y-yl)+0.5);
00853         return k_PalCreateRGB(RVal,GVal,BVal);
00854 }

00928 inline int CStdImage::GetMinX() const
00929 {
00930         if (ROIActive()==true)
00931                 return m_ROIUpperLeft.GetX();
00932         else
00933                 return -m_Image.Origo.x;
00934 }
00935 
00936 inline int CStdImage::GetMinY() const
00937 {
00938         if (ROIActive()==true)
00939                 return m_ROIUpperLeft.GetY();
00940         else
00941                 return -m_Image.Origo.y;
00942 }
00943 
00944 inline int CStdImage::GetMaxX() const
00945 {
00946         if (ROIActive()==true)
00947                 return m_ROILowerRight.GetX();
00948         else
00949                 return m_Image.Width-m_Image.Origo.x;
00950 }
00951 
00952 inline int CStdImage::GetMaxY() const
00953 {
00954         if (ROIActive()==true)
00955                 return m_ROILowerRight.GetY();
00956         else
00957                 return m_Image.Height-m_Image.Origo.y;
00958 }
00959 
00960 
00961 inline UINT16 CStdImage::GetBorderSize() const
00962 {
00963         // get size of border
00964         return m_Image.BorderSize;
00965 }
00966 
00967 inline CPoint2D<int> CStdImage::GetOrigo() const
00968 {
00969         return CPoint2D<int>(m_Image.Origo.x,m_Image.Origo.y);
00970 }
00971 
00972 inline UINT16 CStdImage::GetBits() const
00973 {
00974         // get bits per pixel
00975         return m_Image.Bits;
00976 }
00977 
00978 inline ORIGIN CStdImage::GetOrigin() const
00979 {
00980         // get the origin of image
00981         return m_Image.Origin;
00982 }
00983 
00984 } // end namespace ipl
00985 
00986 #endif //_IPL98_STDIMAGE_H
